segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s actually kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so hard for those cookies, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this whole scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the woman’s foot is already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the most entertaining thing I’ve seen all day.
segments.speaker: PAR
